question: What did the Jews ask Prophet Muhammad (SAW)?
answer:
QUESTION
The Jews asked Prophet Muhammad (SAW) 3 questions. What were these? What is the answer he gave? Why did they ask this?
ANSWER


Share:
The Jews have asked questions many times. On one occasion, the Ulama of the
Jews advised the Kuffaar of Makkah to pose the following three questions: a)
The reality of the soul, b) The incident of the people of cave
(Ashaab-e-Kahf), and c) The king who ruled many places of the world.

Upon these questions, Surah Kahf (cave) was revealed.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
